displayProperties.name: Commander Zavala
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: The resolute Commander Zavala advises Guardians on all Vanguard-related activities.

displayProperties.name: Lord Shaxx
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: The Crucible is the arena in which Guardians forge their Light. Lord Shaxx is the Crucible.

displayProperties.name: Saint-14
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: A legendary hero and the former Titan Vanguard, Saint-14 disappeared into the Infinite Forest only to be later rescued by a fellow Guardian.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Focused Decoding
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Banshee-44
displayProperties.subtitle: Gunsmith
displayProperties.description: Banshee-44 has lived many lives. As master weaponsmith for the Tower, he supplies Guardians with only the best.

displayProperties.name: Valus Saladin
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: Saladin Forge, the last surviving Iron Lord and Valus of Caiatl's empire, oversees the Iron Banner event: trial by combat where only the strongest survive.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ops
displayProperties.description: The Vanguard seeks Guardians to undertake high-priority missions against the City's enemies.

displayProperties.name: Pinnacle Ops
displayProperties.description: Test your might against the toughest combatants.

displayProperties.name: Crucible Ops
displayProperties.description: Hone your skills and win glory in battle against other Guardians.

displayProperties.name: Trials of Osiris
displayProperties.description: Eliminate your opponents or capture the zone to win. Earn as many round and match wins on a ticket as you can.

displayProperties.name: Xûr
displayProperties.subtitle: Strange Gear Offers
displayProperties.description: A peddler of strange curios, Xûr's motives are not his own. He bows to his distant masters, the Nine.

displayProperties.name: Valus Saladin
displayProperties.subtitle: Legacy Gear
displayProperties.description: Saladin Forge, the last surviving Iron Lord and Valus of Caiatl's empire, oversees the Iron Banner event: trial by combat where only the strongest survive.

displayProperties.name: Fire and Ice
displayProperties.subtitle: With Aunor's guidance, enter a Praxic Vault on Europa and claim your Blade.

displayProperties.name: The Desert Perpetual
displayProperties.subtitle: Step across the threshold of the infinite.

displayProperties.name: The Desert Perpetual (Epic)
displayProperties.subtitle: Sing for the end of the unknown.

displayProperties.name: Equilibrium
displayProperties.subtitle: Between fire and shadow, the path to balance.

displayProperties.name: Heliostat
displayProperties.subtitle: Infiltrate a forgotten Golden Age facility to prevent the Conductor from launching a dangerously modified Warsat.
